item.description:
Come join us for cribbage is open to all cribbage players and the public is welcomed to join!

There is an average of almost 20 players per night.

We play in two groups and have a nightly payouts per group.

Group A is the faster players and Group B is the slower less experience players.  All games are one-on-one and we rotate between games. 

This event is a 'pay to play' type event (like poker). This means players contribute $5 to play and the winners get paid the end of the night.

 

 For more information please call Dick Losh at 860.667.0832
item.how_to_find_us: entrance in rear - the road between Chili’s and TGI Friday’s

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Wednesday Night Cribbage
